instructions: Image titled Make Phone Calls With the iPhone 4 Step 1 1 Tap the Phone icon at the bottom of your Home screen. Image titled Make Phone Calls With the iPhone 4 Step 2 2 Scroll down your contacts list to the contact you want to call. Tap the name. At the next screen, tap the number and the iPhone will dial it for you. Advertisement

Image titled Make Phone Calls With the iPhone 4 Step 1 1 Tap the Phone icon at the bottom of your Home screen. Image titled Make Phone Calls With the iPhone 4 Step 4 2 Tap the Favorites icon at the bottom of the screen. Image titled Make Phone Calls With the iPhone 4 Step 5 3 Tap the favorite that you want to call. At the next screen, tap the number to complete the call. Advertisement

Image titled Make Phone Calls With the iPhone 4 Step 10 2 Tap the screen above the keyboard. After you touch it, you should see a black balloon pop up that says "paste." Click it.
